title: They banned me for no reason my new account is TheFirstWish
body:
So last year i made my account ChildishAce i played and everything was fine. One day my account stopped working i couldn't log in so i just change my password everything was fine for a few a days, i was playing and everything was fine then the same thing happened where my account would not log back in so i eventually sent in a ticket after this happened many times. SO eventually i got help from a GM they guided me through all fine and okay so i was playing back on this account and everything was cool. Few days later it happened again after many attempts and asking for help, i was told my account would be compromised if i tried to send in a ticket again, and so it was     


[(https://imgur.com/xmiI7Zw)]
New account is TheFirstWish  

Please unban me... makes no sense why i got banned

replies.body:
Sadly, we're not able to help out with the ban over Boards.
While we're not able to guarantee the ban will be lifted, we do strongly encourage [**messaging Support in a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), particularly with the Account Recovery option. They may be able to offer more information or assistance with the matter there! D:
